description: An over-engineered, soft-sided cooler for serious snacking and hop'n'malt consumption. Fitting up to 20, 355ml cans plus ice, it features super-sturdy handles and a padded shoulder strap for hauling. Puncture-resistant fabric is leak-proof, and won't get mildewy thanks to an anti-microbial liner. An inch of closed-cell foam keeps beverages cool and good-to-go.Yeti DryHide nylon fabric is puncture resistant.Anti-microbial liner resists mildew and mold.Welded seams eliminate stitches to ensure it's leak proof and airtight.HydroShield closure uses super-strong magnet strips for a leak-resistant seal.ColdCell insulation is 1 inch thick on sides and 1.5 inches on bottom for outstanding insulation.Nylon webbing straps and a padded shoulder strap ensure comfortable and sturdy hauling.Lash points on carry straps.Heavy duty EVA foam bottom means it stands on its own.
name: Yeti Hopper M30 Cooler
